title: Ep 296 | Phil's Secret Hiding Place and His Treasure-Hunting Dream
description:
Phil dreams that Jase found gold bars on his land and lets Jase and Al in on his secret hiding place. Zach tells the story of how his infant daughter became part of his family. And Jase shares what a blessing his adopted daughter has been to him.
